documents.document: Good hotel for business stays The hotel is rather clean, as was the room.The room was quite nice with a warm decoration, 80-90s style, quite spacious and had a small balcony with a nice view on the bay.The bathroom was OK and the products supplied - soap, shampoo, etc ... of good quality.I regret that the internet access was paying and sometimes quite slow.The meals were irregularly good. The breakfasts were excellent, with a nice view on the marina.The service was generally excellent.I recommend this hotel for business stays.
